name: Bike Attack Race
description:
Bike Attack Race is distinguished from other bike racing plus shooting games simulators by a faithful reproduction of tactical maneuvers of bike driving on detailed tracks and bike control as well as various other shooting facets than when compared to other bike racing games.

Get ready for endless bike racing adventure with a bit of real action and thrill on detailed tracks. Have an exciting and realistic experience of bike race with amazing super bikes, better graphics and first person view perspective as well as game's diverse camera perspectives contribute to enhance realism.

To keep things interesting, Bike Attack Race offers you various options and modes. Attack on opponent bikers using kick, punch, axe, bat or pistol to deviate their attention from race. Perform acrobatic stunts with amazing super bikes in race arena. There will be frustrating obstacles, crazy traffic, firestorm vehicles and gangsters of crime city on your way. Beware of heavy traffic on road junctions as they can smash you pretty bad. Satisfy your passion and fever towards bike racing and stunts challenge. Earn cash by winning the races. This 3D Bike racing game has various features and challenges.

Share your score with your friends and earn cash by achieving different goals. It is time to hit the roads! If you love racing games and are craving a bit of real action and thrill, Bike Attack Race should definitely be your next move.
How to Play:

• Tilt your device to control the bike
• Tap Bat, Axe, Kick and Punch buttons to beat your opponent Bikes
• Collect different Pickups of Boost, Stunts, Bullets, Shields and Power
• Smash gangsters in your way
• shoot down the fire storm vehicle
• Avoid from different obstacles and vehicles, gangsters coming towards you and gangsters with bikes
• Avoid from accidents at road junctions
• Race as many as you can to earn cash

Features:

• Fast-paced two-wheeler racing action
• Realistic 3D graphics with dynamic lighting and amazing environment of highway
• Superb bike handling, accessible for beginners
• Different amazing heavy sports, chopper and Harley Bikes
• Support for HD IPhone devices and IPad
• Good quality sound effects
• User friendly GUI and controls
• Free Game Just Install and Enjoy..!
